page.description: Copies highlighted controls to the clipboard. The controls can then be pasted onto a separate UX component using the '[Paste Controls from Clipboard]' command. If you want to duplicate controls within a UX page use the '[Duplicate selected controls]' option.

step.description: In the UX Builder's on the UX Controls page highlight the control you want to copy. Click the 'Menu' dropdown in the toolbar and select the 'Copy selected controls to clipboard' option.
Click the 'Copy Controls to Clipboard' button. Now that the controls have been copied you can use the '[Paste Controls from Clipboard]' option to add them to another component.
